EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
SOUTH AFRICA.
DNC 01.
1. UNDERWATER OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL
   FURTHER NOTICE BY:
   A. M/V GARIEP IN 28-39.5S 015-52.3E.
   B. M/V MATHILDA GEM IN 28-43.4S 016-29.8E.
   C. M/V YA TOIVO IN 25-58.9S 014-59.0E.
   TWO MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1031/22.
